data.eml:eml: Fourteen new species of scuttle flies (Diptera, Phoridae) from Denmark

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Henry, R., Bøggild, Esben (2019): Fourteen new species of scuttle flies (Diptera, Phoridae) from Denmark. Zootaxa 4543 (1): 63-89, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4543.1.4
